abstract: Norbert Wabnig, a cheese expert, answers more readers' questions on all things cheese.
snippet: Norbert Wabnig, a cheese expert, answers more readers' questions on all things cheese.
lead_paragraph: Norbert Wabnig, the owner of the Cheese Store of Beverly Hills, is answering readers' questions on all things cheese. Read his first batch of answers here. Post your questions in the comments section here.

headline.main: Your Cheese Questions, Answered — Part II
